div.p: >> Jon: OF ALL BARACK OBAMA'S 2008 CAMPAIGN PROMISES, ONE REMAINS CONSPICUOUSLY UNDO.pcN
HIS PLEDGE TO CLOSE THE INFAMOUS PRISON AT GUANTANAMO BAY.
THAT'S... I DON'T KNOW WHAT THAT IS.
THAT'S... OH, WAIT, THAT'S A YOUTUBE VIDEO OF THE PRESIDENT... THERE WE GO.
WHEN PRESIDENT OBAMA FIRST TOOK OFFICE IT SEEMED LIKE CLOSING GITMO WOULD BE A PRIORITY.
HE EVEN MADE IT A SUBJECT OF ONE OF HIS FIRST EXECUTIVE ORDERS.
LONG STORY SHORT, CONGRESS PUSHED OUT AND WE'RE KEEPING PRISONERS IN CUBA TO KEEP
AMERICANS SAFE BECAUSE THERE'S NO WAY ANYBODY COULD EVER GET TO AMERICA FROM CUBA.
(LAUGHTER) WELL, ANYBODY SIX AND UNDER COULD NEVER GET HERE.
IF ONLY SOMEONE WOULD GET DOWN THERE AND REPORT ON THIS STRANGE PRISON LIMBO.
>> REPORTS TONIGHT ON ALL THE THINGS WE TAXPAYERS ARE PAYING FOR.
>> A CONTROVERSIAL HEAVILY GUARDED SOCCER FIELD, PRICE TAG $7 50,000.
ALSO ENRICHING YOUR LIFE CLASSES WHERE DETAINEE CANS LEARN TO PAINT, WRITE A RESUME, EVEN
D.V.D. MOVIES, NEWSPAPERS AND A LIBRARY.
THEY'VE GOT 13,000 BOOKS IN THE LIBRARY HERE, ALL KINDS OF BOOKS
EVEN "HARRY POTTER" IN RUSSIAN AND ARABIC.
>> Jon: OOH, I WONDER IF THEY HAVE "HARRY POTTER AND THE PRISONER OF AZKABAN" WHERE
INMATES ARE KEPT IN A CREEPY OCEAN-BOUND PRISON IN A STATE OF LIMBO UNTIL THEY EVENTUALLY
(LAUGHTER) I GET IT, OBAMA CAN'T MAKE THE MORAL CASE FOR REPUBLICANS
CLOSING GUANTANAMO SO HE'S TRYING TO MAKE THE TEA PARTY FINANCIAL CASE.
>> Jon: WAIT, I KNOW THAT VOICE.
YOU LOOK LIKE A FABBRIo|ox JAY MUPPET.T-(LAUGHTER) OR AN OLD SCHOOL ISLAMIC RAPPER.
IS THAT A MS. PAC-MANAMA SHEEN?
COST U.S. TAXPAYER A LOT OF MONEY!
GET CHASED BY WOMEN IN BURKAS!
(LAUGHTER) THE REMIND GITMO OF GITMOS WIVES BACK HOME!
>> Jon: GITMO, I'M PRETTY SURE THAT THOSE ARE GHOSTS, NOT...
>> Jon: NO, THEY'RE GHOSTS IN THE GAME GITMO.
I'M SURE YOUR WIFES ARE FINE.
>> Jon: HOW ARE YOU PLANNING TO DO THAT?
PAYING TO TAKE CARE OF GITMO AND FRIENDS.
>> ONE SECOND, JON, TIME FOR GITMO TO ORDER GITMO'S LUNCH.
(LAUGHTER) HOLD ON, LET ME SEE WHAT WE GOT.
(LAUGHTER) GITMO HAVE LOBSTER... MAKE THAT TWO.
BABY BACK RIBS AND A MOJITO.
>> Jon: WAIT, I THOUGHT PORK AND ALCOHOL WERE AGAINST YOUR RELIGION.
